data.title: Yahoo, FindWhat Patent Dispute Ends In Mistrial
data.meta_description: A federal judge in California has declared a mistrial in a patent lawsuit brought by Yahoo!’s Overture Services unit against search engine FindWhat.com and advised the two companies to try to work out a settlement.
